name: HOLOCLEAR
description: HOLOCLEAR is an algorithmically-balanced ecosystem designed to generate viable long-term returns for investors. The $HOLO token is hosted on the BNB Chain and offers holders multiple ways to monetise their holdings. HOLOCLEAR generates a sustainable source of yield, backed by returns from a treasury that is actively managed to maximise capital growth. HOLOCLEAR uses mathematics to balance the power of market forces, using many of the same economic theories as a central bank would. Using dynamic interest rates, auto-regulated taxation and flexible gilt pricing to balance market forces automatically, to minimise volatility and maximise price stability.
